caption.center: In the Matter of the Marriage of DONNA C. WIGHTMAN, Respondent, and GARY

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 79-3-04279-3, Rosselle Pekelis, J., entered May 27, 1982.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed in part and remanded by unpublished opinion per Corbett, A.C.J., concurred in by Callow and Coleman, JJ.
